achievements.title: Rookie Champion
achievements.description: Congratulations on winning your first Pigpong game!

achievements.title: Winning Streak
achievements.description: You're on fire! This achievement is unlocked when you win three consecutive Pigpong games.

achievements.title: Paddle Prodigy
achievements.description: You've proven your paddle skills. This achievement is unlocked when you win a total of nine Pigpong games.

achievements.title: Never Give Up
achievements.description: You've faced defeat but never let it stop you. This achievement is unlocked when you experience nine losses in Pigpong games.

achievements.title: Ultimate Champion
achievements.description: You've reached the pinnacle of Pigpong success! This achievement is unlocked when you accumulate a total of nine wins in the game. You've proven yourself as the ultimate champion, dominating the competition. Enjoy your well-deserved glory!
